entity.description: Potential revenue-generating event, or sale to an account, which needs to be tracked through a sales process to completion.

attributes.name: exchangerate
attributes.description: Shows the conversion rate of the record's currency. The exchange rate is used to convert all money fields in the record from the local currency to the system's default currency.

attributes.name: opportunityid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the opportunity.

attributes.name: createdon
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was created.

attributes.name: createdby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record.

attributes.name: modifiedon
attributes.description: Date and time when the record was modified.

attributes.name: modifiedby
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record.

attributes.name: createdonbehalfby
attributes.description: Shows who created the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: modifiedonbehalfby
attributes.description: Shows who last updated the record on behalf of another user.

attributes.name: ownerid
attributes.description: Owner Id

attributes.name: owningbusinessunit
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the business unit that owns the record

attributes.name: owninguser
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the user that owns the record.

attributes.name: owningteam
attributes.description: Unique identifier for the team that owns the record.

attributes.name: versionnumber
attributes.description: Version Number

attributes.name: emailaddress
attributes.description: The primary email address for the entity.

attributes.name: importsequencenumber
attributes.description: Sequence number of the import that created this record.

attributes.name: overriddencreatedon
attributes.description: Date and time that the record was migrated.

attributes.name: timezoneruleversionnumber
attributes.description: For internal use only.

attributes.name: utcconversiontimezonecode
attributes.description: Time zone code that was in use when the record was created.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: Type a subject or descriptive name, such as the expected order or company name, for the opportunity.

attributes.name: processid
attributes.description: Contains the id of the process associated with the entity.

attributes.name: stageid
attributes.description: Contains the id of the stage where the entity is located.

attributes.name: traversedpath
attributes.description: A comma separated list of string values representing the unique identifiers of stages in a Business Process Flow Instance in the order that they occur.

attributes.name: actualclosedate
attributes.description: Shows the date and time when the opportunity was closed or canceled.

attributes.name: actualvalue
attributes.description: Type the actual revenue amount for the opportunity for reporting and analysis of estimated versus actual sales. Field defaults to the Est. Revenue value when an opportunity is won.

attributes.name: transactioncurrencyid
attributes.description: Choose the local currency for the record to make sure budgets are reported in the correct currency.

attributes.name: actualvalue_base
attributes.description: Value of the Actual Revenue in base currency.

attributes.name: budgetamount
attributes.description: Type a value between 0 and 1,000,000,000,000 to indicate the lead's potential available budget.

attributes.name: budgetamount_base
attributes.description: Value of the Budget Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: budgetstatus
attributes.description: Select the likely budget status for the lead's company. This may help determine the lead rating or your sales approach.

attributes.name: closeprobability
attributes.description: Type a number from 0 to 100 that represents the likelihood of closing the opportunity. This can aid the sales team in their efforts to convert the opportunity in a sale.

attributes.name: completeinternalreview
attributes.description: Select whether an internal review has been completed for this opportunity.

attributes.name: confirminterest
attributes.description: Select whether the lead confirmed interest in your offerings. This helps in determining the lead quality and the probability of it turning into an opportunity.

attributes.name: currentsituation
attributes.description: Type notes about the company or organization associated with the opportunity.

attributes.name: customerid
attributes.description: Select the customer account or contact to provide a quick link to additional customer details, such as address, phone number, activities, and orders.

attributes.name: customerneed
attributes.description: Type some notes about the customer's requirements, to help the sales team identify products and services that could meet their requirements.

attributes.name: customerpainpoints
attributes.description: Type notes about the customer's pain points to help the sales team identify products and services that could address these pain points.

attributes.name: decisionmaker
attributes.description: Select whether your notes include information about who makes the purchase decisions at the lead's company.

attributes.name: description
attributes.description: Type additional information to describe the opportunity, such as possible products to sell or past purchases from the customer.

attributes.name: developproposal
attributes.description: Select whether a proposal has been developed for the opportunity.

attributes.name: discountamount
attributes.description: Type the discount amount for the opportunity if the customer is eligible for special savings.

attributes.name: discountamount_base
attributes.description: Value of the Opportunity Discount Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: discountpercentage
attributes.description: Type the discount rate that should be applied to the Product Totals field to include additional savings for the customer in the opportunity.

attributes.name: estimatedclosedate
attributes.description: Enter the expected closing date of the opportunity to help make accurate revenue forecasts.

attributes.name: estimatedvalue
attributes.description: Type the estimated revenue amount to indicate the potential sale or value of the opportunity for revenue forecasting. This field can be either system-populated or editable based on the selection in the Revenue field.

attributes.name: estimatedvalue_base
attributes.description: Value of the Est. Revenue in base currency.

attributes.name: evaluatefit
attributes.description: Select whether the fit between the lead's requirements and your offerings was evaluated.

attributes.name: resolvefeedback
attributes.description: Choose whether the proposal feedback has been captured and resolved for the opportunity.

attributes.name: filedebrief
attributes.description: Choose whether the sales team has recorded detailed notes on the proposals and the account's responses.

attributes.name: completefinalproposal
attributes.description: Select whether a final proposal has been completed for the opportunity.

attributes.name: finaldecisiondate
attributes.description: Enter the date and time when the final decision of the opportunity was made.

attributes.name: freightamount
attributes.description: Type the cost of freight or shipping for the products included in the opportunity for use in calculating the Total Amount field.

attributes.name: freightamount_base
attributes.description: Value of the Freight Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: initialcommunication
attributes.description: Choose whether someone from the sales team contacted this lead earlier.

attributes.name: isrevenuesystemcalculated
attributes.description: Select whether the estimated revenue for the opportunity is calculated automatically based on the products entered or entered manually by a user.

attributes.name: need
attributes.description: Choose how high the level of need is for the lead's company.

attributes.name: opportunityratingcode
attributes.description: Select the expected value or priority of the opportunity based on revenue, customer status, or closing probability.

constrainedList.name: opportunity_opportunityratingcode
constrainedList.description: Quality of the opportunity, such as hot.

attributes.name: parentaccountid
attributes.description: Choose an account to connect this opportunity to, so that the relationship is visible in reports and analytics, and to provide a quick link to additional details, such as financial information and activities.

attributes.name: parentcontactid
attributes.description: Choose a contact to connect this opportunity to, so that the relationship is visible in reports and analytics.

attributes.name: participatesinworkflow
attributes.description: Information about whether the opportunity participates in workflow rules.

attributes.name: pricelevelid
attributes.description: Choose the price list associated with this record to make sure the products associated with the campaign are offered at the correct prices.

attributes.name: pricingerrorcode
attributes.description: Pricing error for the opportunity.

attributes.name: prioritycode
attributes.description: Select the priority so that preferred customers or critical issues are handled quickly.

attributes.name: purchaseprocess
attributes.description: Choose whether an individual or a committee will be involved in the  purchase process for the lead.

attributes.name: purchasetimeframe
attributes.description: Choose how long the lead will likely take to make the purchase.

attributes.name: salesstage
attributes.description: Select the sales stage of this opportunity to aid the sales team in their efforts to win this opportunity.

constrainedList.name: opportunity_salesstage
constrainedList.description: The sales process stage that this entity is in.

attributes.name: salesstagecode
attributes.description: Select the sales process stage for the opportunity to indicate the probability of closing the opportunity.

constrainedList.name: opportunity_salesstagecode
constrainedList.description: Customizable code that represents the current stage of an opportunity in a manual sales process. Designed to support manual sales processes upgraded from earlier versions of Microsoft Dynamics 365.

attributes.name: presentproposal
attributes.description: Select whether a proposal for the opportunity has been presented to the account.

attributes.name: captureproposalfeedback
attributes.description: Choose whether the proposal feedback has been captured for the opportunity.

attributes.name: proposedsolution
attributes.description: Type notes about the proposed solution for the opportunity.

attributes.name: pursuitdecision
attributes.description: Select whether the decision about pursuing the opportunity has been made.

attributes.name: qualificationcomments
attributes.description: Type comments about the qualification or scoring of the lead.

attributes.name: quotecomments
attributes.description: Type comments about the quotes associated with the opportunity.

attributes.name: sendthankyounote
attributes.description: Select whether a thank you note has been sent to the account for considering the proposal.

attributes.name: schedulefollowup_prospect
attributes.description: Enter the date and time of the prospecting follow-up meeting with the lead.

attributes.name: schedulefollowup_qualify
attributes.description: Enter the date and time of the qualifying follow-up meeting with the lead.

attributes.name: scheduleproposalmeeting
attributes.description: Enter the date and time of the proposal meeting for the opportunity.

attributes.name: statecode
attributes.description: Shows whether the opportunity is open, won, or lost. Won and lost opportunities are read-only and can't be edited until they are reactivated.

attributes.name: statuscode
attributes.description: Select the opportunity's status.

constrainedList.name: opportunity_statuscode
constrainedList.description: Reason for the status of the opportunity.

attributes.name: stepid
attributes.description: Shows the ID of the workflow step.

attributes.name: stepname
attributes.description: Shows the current phase in the sales pipeline for the opportunity. This is updated by a workflow.

attributes.name: timeline
attributes.description: Select when the opportunity is likely to be closed.

attributes.name: totalamount
attributes.description: Shows the total amount due, calculated as the sum of the products, discounts, freight, and taxes for the opportunity.

attributes.name: totalamount_base
attributes.description: Value of the Total Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: totalamountlessfreight
attributes.description: Shows the total product amount for the opportunity, minus any discounts. This value is added to freight and tax amounts in the calculation for the total amount of the opportunity.

attributes.name: totalamountlessfreight_base
attributes.description: Value of the Total Pre-Freight Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: totaldiscountamount
attributes.description: Shows the total discount amount, based on the discount price and rate entered on the opportunity.

attributes.name: totaldiscountamount_base
attributes.description: Value of the Total Discount Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: totallineitemamount
attributes.description: Shows the sum of all existing and write-in products included on the opportunity, based on the specified price list and quantities.

attributes.name: totallineitemamount_base
attributes.description: Value of the Total Detail Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: totallineitemdiscountamount
attributes.description: Shows the total of the Manual Discount amounts specified on all products included in the opportunity. This value is reflected in the Total Detail Amount field on the opportunity and is added to any discount amount or rate specified on the opportunity.

attributes.name: totallineitemdiscountamount_base
attributes.description: Value of the Total Line Item Discount Amount in base currency.

attributes.name: totaltax
attributes.description: Shows the total of the Tax amounts specified on all products included in the opportunity, included in the Total Amount field calculation for the opportunity.

attributes.name: totaltax_base
attributes.description: Value of the Total Tax in base currency.

attributes.name: identifycustomercontacts
attributes.description: Select whether the customer contacts for this opportunity have been identified.

attributes.name: identifycompetitors
attributes.description: Select whether information about competitors is included.

attributes.name: identifypursuitteam
attributes.description: Choose whether you have recorded who will pursue the opportunity.

attributes.name: presentfinalproposal
attributes.description: Select whether the final proposal has been presented to the account.

attributes.name: onholdtime
attributes.description: Shows the duration in minutes for which the opportunity was on hold.

attributes.name: lastonholdtime
attributes.description: Contains the date time stamp of the last on hold time.

attributes.name: slaid
attributes.description: Choose the service level agreement (SLA) that you want to apply to the opportunity record.

attributes.name: slainvokedid
attributes.description: Last SLA that was applied to this opportunity. This field is for internal use only.

attributes.name: timespentbymeonemailandmeetings
attributes.description: Total time spent for emails (read and write) and meetings by me in relation to the opportunity record.

attributes.name: originatingleadid
attributes.description: Choose the lead that the opportunity was created from for reporting and analytics. The field is read-only after the opportunity is created and defaults to the correct lead when an opportunity is created from a converted lead.

attributes.name: accountid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the account with which the opportunity is associated.

attributes.name: contactid
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the contact associated with the opportunity.

attributes.name: campaignid
attributes.description: Shows the campaign that the opportunity was created from. The ID is used for tracking the success of the campaign.
